Why <S%G3606><s%> he is able <S%G1410><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> them to the uttermost <S%G3838><s%> that come <S%G4334><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> by him, seeing he ever <S%G3842><s%> lives <S%G2198><s%> to make <S%G1793><s%> intercession <S%G1793><s%> for them.
